name: Out for Revenge - The Campus Game Jam
name_original: Out for Revenge - The Campus Game Jam
description:
You are a pet sitter tasked with preventing the family's destructive cat from destroying all of the valuable ornaments. 

To keep the cat from destroying everything, keep it occupied with various cat toys (decoys).

 Remember, if something breaks, it comes out of your paycheck.

Instructions:

Select the Toys to distract the cat
